gurmukhi: ਨ ਧਰਮ ਕਰਮ ਕੌ ਕਰੈਂ ॥ ਬ੍ਰਿਥਾ ਕਥਾ ਸੁਨੇ ਰਰੈਂ ॥ ਕੁਕਰਮ ਕਰਮ ਸੋ ਫਸੈ ॥ ਸਤਿ ਛਾਡ ਧਰਮਵਾ ਨਸੈ ॥੪੬॥
transliteration: Na Dharma Karam Kau Darain|| Brithaa Kathaa Soune Darain|| Koukaram Karam So Phasai|| Sat(i) Chhaad Dharamvaa Nasai||46||
translation: No one will perform the rituals enjoyed by religion and the people will quarrel amongst themselves in evil actions to such an extent that they will totally forsake the religion and truth.46.

gurmukhi: ਪੁਰਾਣ ਕਾਬਿ ਨਾ ਪੜੈਂ ॥ ਕੁਰਾਨ ਲੈ ਨ ਤੇ ਰੜੈਂ ॥ ਅਧਰਮ ਕਰਮ ਕੋ ਕਰੈਂ ॥ ਸੁ ਧਰਮ ਜਾਸ ਤੇ ਡਰੈਂ ॥੪੭॥
transliteration: Puraan Kaah(i) Na Padain|| Kuraan Lai Na Te Radain|| Adharam Karam Ko Darain|| Su Dharm Jaas Te Darain||47||
translation: They will not study Puranas and Epics and will also not read the holy Quran; they will perform such acts of adharma, that even dharma will also feel frightened.47.

gurmukhi: ਧਰਾਕਿ ਵਰਣਤਾ ਭੲੀ ॥ ਸੁ ਭਰਮ ਧਰਮ ਕੀ ਗੲੀ ॥ ਗ੍ਹਿੰ ਗ੍ਹਿੰ ਨਯੋ ਮਤੰ ॥ ਚਲੇ ਭੂਅੰ ਜਥਾ ਤਥੰ ॥੪੮॥
transliteration: Dharaak Grihan Nae Bhaee|| Su Bharam Dharma Kigade|| Grihan Griban Naye Matan|| Chale Bhooan Jathaa Tathan||48||
translation: The whole earth will assume only one caste (of sin) and the trust in religion will be finished; there will be new sects in every home and the people will adopt only misconduct.48.

gurmukhi: ਗ੍ਹਿੰ ਗ੍ਹਿੰ ਨੲੇ ਮਤੰ ॥ ਭੲੀ ਧਰੰ ਨੲੀ ਗਤੰ ॥ ਅਧਰਮ ਰਾਜਤਾ ਲੲੀ ॥ ਨਿਕਾਰ ਧਰਮ ਦੇਸ ਦੀ ॥੪੯॥
transliteration: Griban Griban Nae Matan|| Bhai Dharan Nai Gadan|| Adharam Raajtaa Laee|| Nikaar Dharma Des Di||49||
translation: There will be now sects in every home; there will be new paths on the earth; there will be the reign of adharma and dharma will be exiled.49.

gurmukhi: ਪ੍ਰਬੋਧ ੲੇਕ ਨਾ ਲਗੈ ॥ ਸੁਧਰਮ ਅਧਰਮ ਤੇ ਭਗੈ ॥ ਕੁਕਰਮ ਪ੍ਰਚੁਰਯੰ ਜਗੰ ॥ ਸੁ ਕਰਮ ਪੰਖ ਕੈ ਭਗੰ ॥੫੦॥
transliteration: Prabodh Ek Naa Lagad|| Sudharam Adharam Te Bhagad|| Koukaram Prachurayan Jagadg|| Su Karam Pankh Kai Bhagadg||50||
translation: There will be no impact of knowledge on anyone and dharma will flee in the face of adharma; the wicked acts will be greatly propagated and dharma will fly away with wings.50.

gurmukhi: ਪ੍ਰਪੰਚ ਪੰਚ ਹੁੲਿ ਗਡਾ ॥ ਅਪ੍ਰਪੰਚ ਪੰਖ ਕੈ ੳੁਡਾ ॥ ਕੁਕਰਮ ਬਿਚਰਤੰ ਜਗੰ ॥ ਸੁਕਰਮ ਸੁਭ੍ਰਮੰ ਭਗੰ ॥੫੧॥
transliteration: Prapanch Panch Hue Gadaa|| Aprapanch Pankh Kai Udaa|| Koukaram Bicharatan Jagadg|| Soukaram Soubhramannd Bhagadg||51||
translation: The deceit will be appointed as judge and the simplicity will fly away; the whole world will be absorbed in vicious acts and the good acts will speed away.51.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਕ੍ਰਿਤੰ ਤਜਿ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਕੁਕ੍ਰਿਤੰ ਭਜਿ ਹੈਂ ॥੫੨॥
transliteration: Soukritan Taj(i) Hain|| Koukritan Bhaj(i) Hain||52||
translation: The people will pay attention to wicked things forsaking the good ones.52.

gurmukhi: ਭ੍ਰਮਣੰ ਭਰਿ ਹੈਂ ॥ ਜਸ ਤੇ ਟਰਿ ਹੈਂ ॥੫੩॥
transliteration: Bhramanndng Bhar(i) Hain|| Jas Te Tar(i) Hain||
translation: They will be filled with illusions and will abandon the approbation.53.

gurmukhi: ਕਰਿ ਹੈਂ ਦੁਕ੍ਰਿਤੰ ॥ ਰਰਿ ਹੈਂ ਅਨ੍ਰਿਥੰ ॥੫੪॥
transliteration: Kar(i) Hain Doukritan|| Rar(i) Hain Anrithan||54||
translation: They will do wicked deeds and quarrel uselessly amongst themselves.54.
They will recite the evil mantras and will establish the uncivilised notions.55.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਨੇ ਦੇਸ ਦੇਸੰ ਮੁਨੰ ਪਾਪ ਕਰਮਾ ॥ ਚੁਨੈ ਜੂਠ ਕੂਠੰ ਸ੍ਰੁਤੰ ਛੋਰ ਧਰਮਾ ॥੫੬॥
transliteration: Soune Des Desan Mounndng Paap Karmaa|| Choonai Jeeth Koothan Sroutan Chhodh Dharmaa||56||
translation: The sages will be noticed to have performed sinful acts in various countries; they will abandon the path enjoined by the Vedas and only select the impure and false rituals.56.

gurmukhi: ਤਜੈ ਧਰਮ ਨਾਰੀ ਤਕੈ ਪਾਪ ਨਾਰੰ ॥ ਮਹਾ ਰੂਪ ਪਾਪੀ ਕੁਵ੍ਰਿਤਾਧਿਕਾਰੰ ॥੫੭॥
transliteration: Tajai Dharma Naari Takai Paap Naaran|| Mahaa Roop Paapi Kuritaadhikaaran||57||
translation: The men and women will forsake dharma and absorb themselves in sinful deeds and the great sinners will become the administration.57.
